categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Hexagon was the name given by the Rebel Alliance to a region of space located on the border of the Mid Rim and Outer Rim Territories. Inside the Hexagon, there was a large amount of Rebel activity during the Galactic Civil War. A large contribution to the rebels in this area came from Meysen Kayson and the Greel Wood Logging Corporation.
